iso_tetralemma_resolution.definition: Isomorphic patterns in tetralemma resolution capture structural equivalences in paradoxical hierarchies—mappings where affirmations, denials, hybrids, and voids preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include probe applications, tension resolutions, and convergent unities, validated via 2025 logic studies (e.g., AI paradox probes per web:4; cognitive tetralemmas per web:9) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., quantum superpositions to ethical dilemmas). Hard-to-vary invariants like resolvent persistence enable forecasts; upgraded with tetralemma probes for meta-paradox (affirm resolution/deny irreducibility/both in probes/neither in convergences); scores >0.98 based on 2025 logical abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to affirm-deny-both-neither overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from 2025 logic/web and paradoxical contrasts (e.g., AI ethics probes to bio dilemmas).
Validate coverage across scales (subatomic → cosmic); flag gaps as speculative (e.g., cosmic paradox links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., ethical tetralemmas); integrate diachronic depth (ancient logic to 2025 AI resolutions).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

data.description: Positive mappings of structures; affirmations preserve invariance (e.g., AI capability affirmations per web:1; logical positives per web:5).
Negative exclusions; denials map invariantly (e.g., deny AI uniqueness per web:2; logical negations per web:6).
Combined and null resolutions; hybrids/voids preserve paradox (e.g., both/neither in AI consciousness per web:3; meta-logic per web:8).

gaps: Resolution divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm resolution/deny irreducibility/both in probes/neither in convergences.
